doc.title: Epic 6: Init Cleanup and Enhancement
doc.snippet: Updates documentation to explain backup and cleanup process, init flags, what happens during init, FAQ answers, and troubleshooting for init issues.

story-context.constraints: - Update docs/user-guide/quick-start.md: add backup/cleanup explanation after installation - Update docs/user-guide/commands.md: document zprof init flags with examples - Create section in docs/user-guide/installation.md: "What Happens During Init" - Explain three phases: Backup (all config preserved), Cleanup (files moved), Integration (new .zshenv) - Emphasize reversibility: "can be restored anytime using zprof uninstall" - Update docs/user-guide/faq.md with questions: - "What happens to my .zshrc?" - "Can I undo zprof init?" - "Is it safe to run init multiple times?" - Add troubleshooting section for common init issues: - Permission denied errors - Disk space issues - Existing installation conflicts - Keep documentation beginner-friendly, clear, and reassuring - Include examples and command outputs
